short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Product Insights and Amazon Affiliate Link Creation for Creators/Publishers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension empowers creators and publishers with essential tools for Amazon product research and affiliate link generation:

1. Instant Product Insights:
 - View clicks data for Amazon products
 - Check category rankings at a glance

2. Effortless Affiliate Link Creation:
 - Generate Amazon Associate links using your unique ID
 - Partner with featured brands & generate Hypelinks with potentially higher commission rates

Streamline your product discovery process and quickly create affiliate links while browsing Amazon. For advanced link management and performance tracking, check out our comprehensive web application on www.hypelinks.com.
